articles.title: Here's *exactly* how dumb the mask debate has become
articles.description: In case you've been on another planet this week -- in which case, can I come along!?!? -- know that Texas Gov. Greg Abbott and Mississippi Gov. Tate Reeves lifted the mask mandates in their states.
articles.content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE!

articles.title: A newly proposed Tennessee bill would give immunity to drivers who unintentionally hit protesters blocking streets
articles.description: A newly proposed bill in Tennessee would make it even more difficult to protest in the state -- by making obstructing a highway a felony and giving immunity to drivers who unintentionally injure or kill those in the way.
